oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unifying parameters in mechanical weed control research - report of the roundtable
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rasmussen, Jesper
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report summarises (i) the introduction given at the initiation of the roundtable discussion about unifying parameters in mechanical weed control and (ii) the following discussion at the EWRS Physical and Cultural Weed Control Group meeting in Zaragoza 2009
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rasmussen, Jesper (2009) Unifying parameters in mechanical weed control research - report of the roundtable. In: Proceedings 8th EWRS Workshop on Physical and Cultural Weed Control, pp. 142-145.
